name: MockERC20 Policy
author: Newton
description:
This policy is a mock policy for the MockERC20 token:
• Pyth Oracle: Uses Pyth Oracle to get the price of BTC in real-time.
• Function restrictions: Restricts allowed trading functions (buy, sell)
• Amount limits: Enforces maximum trade amount in USDC
• Market conditions: Token must have had upward price movement over the last 6 months
• Buy amount limit: Only allows buying MockERC20 tokens (via minting) under the current BTC price.
